1: I sing a new song with all the earth.
2: I celebrate and share saving goodness every day.
3: Proclaim glory and wonders to all people worldwide.
4: Celebrate the greatest above all with wholehearted praise.
5: Honor the Creator of the heavens
6: In sacred presence, honor, strength, and beauty flourish.
7: Offer the divine glory and strength.
8: I honor the sacred with gifts and joyfully enter community.
9: All the earth worships the sacred in holy beauty
10: Rightful rule ensures a stable world and fair justice for all.
11: All creation celebrates together in joyful harmony.
12: Fields and trees rejoice; all the world celebrates together.
13: The world is governed by righteousness and truth.
